# v0.22.166

## release on 20251107
## description
## changes
Changes

fix: threaded notifications (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3600166366" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/zalando/skipper/issues/3704" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/zalando/skipper/pull/3704/hovercard" href="https://github.com/zalando/skipper/pull/3704">#3704</a>)

This commit fixes the reference to the output of the step.  

Also moving the check-race step further in pipeline, it is cheaper to  

fail earlier in case if vulnerability detected.  

The query argument moved to the secret itself.

Multiarch Docker image

Multiarch Docker image is available in Github's docker registry:

    docker run -it ghcr.io/zalando/skipper:v0.22.166 skipper --help

Docker image

Docker image is available in Zalando's Open Source registry:

    docker run -it registry.opensource.zalan.do/teapot/skipper:v0.22.166 skipper --help
